1.  Introduction

mirrors
 
and

1.1  Hydrogen  Holographic  Model  Overview  
The  Hydrogen  Holographic  Model  proposes  that  hydrogen  atoms  act  as  fundamental  
holographic

of

both

and
 
structural
 
information
 
into
 
neural
 
architectures.

this
 
model:
 
●  Hydrogen  proton  sources  ( ✦ )  emit  coherent  phase  information  initiating  neural  
dynamics.

symmetry
 
and
 
differentiation.
